name: Curse of the Evil Eyes
description:
A tiny 64x64 tactics game, with roguelike elements, created for LOWREZJAM 2020.

Controls:

  • Move/Select: WASD or ARROW KEYS
  • Confirm: ENTER or SPACE
  • Cancel: ESC

As Shining Force is one of my favorite games, I wanted to create something in the same vein, but with light procedural generation and permadeath.

Made with these wonderful assets:

  • Kenney's Micro Roguelike
  • DawnBringer 32 palette
  • The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Collection
